Churches

InterVarsity invites you to get connected to a local church! Our members come from all sorts of backgrounds and cultures. As such, the churches we attend are very diverse! From the formal to the casual, the big to the small, the modern to the traditional, and even from the early birds to the night owls, whatever sort of church you seek, we’ll gladly help you find one in which you can joyfully serve.

Churches we attend

Church of the Ascension

City Reformed Presbyterian Church

Hot Metal Bridge Faith Community

Korean Central Church of Pittsburgh

Pittsburgh Chinese Church

Saint Paul Cathedral

Fellowships
@ CMU

InterVarsity at CMU is a part of CMU's Inter-Fellowship Association (IFA), which is the union of all the Christian fellowships on campus. The groups are all united together to glorify God, but we each do it a little differently, so feel free to check out our fellow fellowships on IFA's website!

InterVarsity Christian Fellowship
Carnegie Mellon University
ivcf@andrew.cmu.edu
2017
